section.title: Practice
section.para: 1. Take a copy of the kernel, initrd and System.map files in /boot in /boot, naming them 3.0 instead of 2.6.
2. Add a stanza in grub for the 3.0 files. Make sure the title is different.
3. Reboot and test the new stanza.

section.title: Solutions
section.para: 1. Take a copy of the kernel, initrd and System.map files in /boot in /boot, naming them 3.0 instead of 2.6.
section.screen: cd /boot cp vmlinuz-2.6.18-8.e15 vmlinuz-3.0 cp initrd-2.6.18-8.e15.img initrd-3.0.img cp System.map-2.6.18-8.e15 System.map-3.0
section.para: 2. Add a stanza in grub for the 3.0 files. Make sure the title is different.
section.screen: [root@RHEL5 ~]# grep 3.0 /boot/grub/menu.lst title Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server (3.0) kernel /vmlinuz-3.0 ro root=/dev/VolGroup00/LogVol00 rhgb quiet initrd /initrd-3.0.img [root@RHEL5 ~]#
section.para: 3. Reboot and test the new stanza.
